mapper.select: select m.user_num , userId , pwd , userName , nickName , to_char(birth , 'yyyy-mm-dd') birth , gender , email , tel , content , photo , mbti from member1 m join member_info i on m.user_num = i.user_num join member_profile p on m.user_num = p.user_num where m.user_num = #{user_num}
mapper.update: UPDATE member_profile SET mbti = #{mbti} WHERE user_num = #{user_num}
UPDATE member_info SET nickname=#{nickName} , gender=#{gender} , tel=#{tel} , modify_date = sysdate WHERE user_num = #{user_num}
UPDATE member1 SET username = #{userName} WHERE user_num = #{user_num}
UPDATE member1 SET enabled = 0 WHERE user_num = #{user_num}
